description: A short description of the project.

__prompts__.project_name: project_name - Project name that will appear as the main header in README.md (must start with a letter, use only spaces as separators)
__prompts__.description: description - Brief project description for README.md (max 72 characters)
__prompts__.repo_name: repo_name - Repository folder name (must start with a letter, no spaces or underscores allowed, use hyphens instead)
__prompts__.src_package_name: src_package_name - Python package name for source code (must start with a letter, no spaces or hyphens allowed, use underscores instead)
__prompts__.src_package_name_short: src_package_name_short - Short alias for the source package (must start with a letter, no spaces or hyphens allowed)

platform.__prompt__: platform - Select the platform where this project will run:

orchestrator.__prompt__: orchestrator - Select the orchestration system for this project:

aisg-gitlab.__prompt__: aisg-gitlab - The gitlab domain for the repoitory.
aisg-gitlab.True: True - .gitlab-ci.yml will be populated for AISG's gitlab
aisg-gitlab.False: False - .gitlab-ci.yml will be populated for generic use

__prompts__.proj_name: proj_name - Project name used by the orchestrator (for Run:ai, this will be the Run:ai project name)
__prompts__.registry_project_path: registry_project_path - Full path to container registry (without trailing slash, e.g., registry.domain.tld/project/image)

problem_template.__prompt__: problem_template - Select a problem template to initialize your repository:
problem_template.base: base - Base template (minimal setup with no model packages)
problem_template.cv: cv - Computer Vision template (MNIST with PyTorch)

__prompts__.author_name: author_name - Your name or team name (no hyphens allowed)
